question:
Regarding the treatment choice of advanced pancreatic adenocarcinoma, which of the following statements are (is) correct?
(1) Induction chemotherapy preferred 4-6 months followed by chemoradiation in selected locally advanced without systemic metastatic disease.
(2) Recommended adjuvant therapy options apply to patients who do not receive prior neoadjuvant therapy.
(3) First line treatment for metastatic disease could be FOLFIRINOX or NALIRIFOX (liposomal irinotecan, oxaliplatin, leucovorin, and fluorouracil).
(4) For known BRCA1/2 or PALB2 mutation first line treatment for metastatic disease could be gemcitabine + albumin-bound paclitaxel.
explanation:
(1) Induction chemotherapy preferred 4-6 months followed by chemoradiation in selected locally advanced without systemic metastatic disease.
Correct
*NCCN Guidelines Version 2.2025. PANC-6 (Figure1)
-In patients with locally advanced, unresectable disease 
-- Good or intermediate performance status
--> initial systemic chemotherapy for 4-6 months 
--> In selected patients (good performance status+ no systemic metastases): consolidation chemoradiation or SBRT
-- Poor PS: single agent chemotherapy or palliative RT 

參考trial
*LAP07 Trial (Hammel et al., JAMA Oncology, 2016): no clear survival benefit with the addition of conventional chemoradiation following gemcitabine monotherapy. Chemoradiation may improve local control and delay the need for resumption therapy


(2) Correct, Recommended adjuvant therapy options apply to patients who do not receive prior neoadjuvant therapy.
*NCCN Guidelines Version 2.2025. PANC-6、PANC-8、PANC-F (2 OF 13) (Figure2)(Figure3)
- Recommended adjuvant therapy options apply to patients who did not receive prior neoadjuvant therapy.
-- For those who received prior neoadjuvant therapy, the adjuvant therapy options are dependent on the response to neoadjuvant therapy and other clinical considerations.
(建議的輔助治療選項適用於未接受neoadjuvant的患者、對於曾接受neoadjuvant的患者，輔助治療選項需考慮對neoadjuvant的反應以及其他臨床考量因素。)
- Adjuvant treatment should be administered to patients who have adequately recovered from surgery; treatment should be initiated ideally within 12 weeks

(3) Correct, First line treatment for metastatic disease could be FOLFIRINOX or NALIRIFOX (liposomal irinotecan, oxaliplatin, leucovorin, and fluorouracil).
*NCCN Guidelines Version 2.2025. PANC-F 5 OF 13
- recommended first line therapy
--•FOLFIRINOX (category 1) or modified FOLFIRINOX (*a)
--•Gemcitabine + albumin-bound paclitaxel (category 1) (*b)
--•NALIRIFOX (category 1) (*c)

參考trial (3篇)
*a Conroy T, Desseigne F, Ychou M, et al. FOLFIRINOX versus gemcitabine for metastatic pancreatic cancer. N Engl J Med 2011;364:1817-1825. 
*a-1 研究方法 
-- 隨機分配 342 名ECOG 0 或 1 的患者，接受 FOLFIRINOX 或 gemcitabine 治療。
(FOLFIRINOX= oxaliplatin, 85 mg/m2; irinotecan, 180 mg/m2; leucovorin, 400 mg/m2; and fluorouracil, 400mg/m2 bolus + 2400mg/m2 46-hour連續輸注, Q2wks)
(Gemcitabine 1000 mg/m2 Qwk, 7 of 8 weeks and then Qwk for 3 of 4 weeks) 每週給藥7周、第8周休息，再來每週給藥3周、第4周休息
-- 療程6個月(who had a response)
-- The primary end point= overall survival.
*a-2 研究結果
-- mOS: FOLFIRINOX 組為 11.1 個月，Gemcitabine 組為 6.8 個月(hazard ratio for death, 0.57，P<0.001)(Figure4)
-- mPFS: FOLFIRINOX 組為 6.4 個月，Gemcitabine 組為 3.3 個月(hazard ratio for disease progression, 0.47，P<0.001)(Figure5)
-- ORR: FOLFIRINOX 組為 31.6%，Gemcitabine 組為 9.4% (P<0.001)
-- 不良事件: FOLFIRINOX 組較多，其中 5.4% Febrile Neutropenia 
-- 6個月時的生活品質明顯下降: FOLFIRINOX 組31%，而 gemcitabine 組則為 66% (hazard ratio, 0.47; P<0.001).(Figure6)
*a-3 結論
As compared with gemcitabine, FOLFIRINOX was associated with a survival advantage and had increased toxicity. FOLFIRINOX is an option for the treatment of patients with metastatic pancreatic cancer and good performance status.


*b Von Hoff DD, Ervin T, Arena FP, et al. Increased survival in pancreatic cancer with nab-paclitaxel plus gemcitabine. N Engl J Med 2013;369:1691-1703.
*b-1 研究方法 
隨機分配 Karnofsky performance-status 70 分以上的metastatic pancreatic cancer患者接受 nab-paclitaxel+gemcitabine 或是gemcitabine monotherapy
(nab-paclitaxel 125 mg/m2與 Gemcitabine 1000 mg/m2，於每 4 週的第 1、8 和 15 天給予)
(Gemcitabine 1000 mg/m2單用，在第 1 個療程中，每週打，7 週後停1週，從第 2 個療程起，每 4 週的第 1、8 和 15 天給予)
-- 療程打到disease progression
-- The primary end point= OS.
-- The secondary end point= PFS and overall response rate.

*b-2 研究結果
-- 431 vs 430人
-- mOS: Nab-paclitaxel–gemcitabine 組 8.5 個月，Gemcitabine 組則為 6.7 個月(hazard ratio for death, 0.72；P<0.001)(Figure7)
--1 年OS：nab-paclitaxel–gemcitabine 組為 35%，Gemcitabine 組為 22%。
--2 年OS：nab-paclitaxel–gemcitabine 組為 9%，Gemcitabine 組為 4%。
-- mPFS: Nab-paclitaxel–gemcitabine 組 5.5 個月，Gemcitabine 組則為 3.7 個月(hazard ratio for disease progression or death, 0.69；P<0.001)(Figure8)
-- ORR: Nab-paclitaxel–gemcitabine 組為 23%，Gemcitabine 組為 7%（P<0.001）
-- 3 級或以上最常見的不良事件：Nab-paclitaxel–gemcitabine 組比較多 --> Neutropenia (38% vs. 27%)、Fatigue (17% vs7%)、Neuropathy(17% vs1%)
-- 其他不良事件: Febrile neutropenia(3% vs. 1%)

*b-3 結論
In patients with metastatic pancreatic adenocarcinoma, nab-paclitaxel plus gemcitabine significantly improved overall survival, progression-free survival, and response rate, but rates of peripheral neuropathy and myelosuppression were increased.



*c Wainberg ZA, Melisi D, Macarulla T, et al. NALIRIFOX versus nab-paclitaxel and gemcitabine in treatment-naive patients with metastatic pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma (NAPOLI 3): a randomised, open-label, phase 3 trial. Lancet 2023;402:1272-1281.
*c-1 研究方法
-- randomised, open-label, phase 3 study
-- mPDAC，且ECOG 0 或 1。患者以 1:1 的比例隨機分配至NALIRIFOX 組或Nab-paclitaxel + Gemcitabine 組
(NALIRIFOX 組：Liposomal irinotecan 50 mg/m², Oxaliplatin 60 mg/m², Leucovorin 400 mg/m², Fluorouracil 2400 mg/m² 46 小時持續輸注。每 28 天週期的第 1 天與第 15 天)
(Nab-paclitaxel + Gemcitabine 組：Nab-paclitaxel 125 mg/m², Gemcitabine 1000 mg/m²。每 28 天週期的第 1、8 和 15 天給予)
-- The primary end point= OS.

*c-2 研究結果
-- 383 vs 387人
-- mOS: NALIRIFOX 11.1 個月、Nab-paclitaxel + Gemcitabine 組 9.2 個月、(hazard ratio for death, 0.83；p=0.036)(Figure9)(Figure10)
-- 3 級或以上治療相關不良事件: NALIRIFOX 組 87%、Nab-paclitaxel + Gemcitabine 組 86% 
-- 治療相關死亡（Treatment-related deaths）：兩組均為2%

*c-3 結論
The use of the NALIRIFOX regimen as a possible reference regimen for first-line treatment of mPDAC.



(4) Incorrect, For known BRCA1/2 or PALB2 mutation first line treatment for metastatic disease could be gemcitabine + albumin-bound paclitaxel.
應修正為Gem-Cis
*NCCN Guidelines Version 2.2025. PANC-F 5 OF 13 (Figure11)
- Only for known BRCA1/2 or PALB2 mutations:
--•FOLFIRINOX (category 1) or modified FOLFIRINOX (見選項3的*a trial)
--•Gemcitabine + cisplatin (*d)

參考trial
*d O'Reilly EM, Lee JW, Zalupski M, et al. Randomized, multicenter, phase II trial of gemcitabine and cisplatin with or without veliparib in patients with pancreas adenocarcinoma and a germline BRCA/PALB2 mutation. J Clin Oncol 2020;38:1378-1388.

*d-1 研究方法
-- 未經治療的gBRCA/PALB2 陽性 pancreas adenocarcinoma with measurable stage III to IV, ECOG 0 to 1.
-- 分別接受 A 組 Cisplatin+Gemcitabine 另一組 B 組 Cis+Gem+Veliparib 80mg
(A 組Cisplatin 25 mg/m² + Gemcitabine 600 mg/m²，於 第 3 天和第 10 天給藥)
(B 組與 A 組相同，再加上 Veliparib 80 mg，每日口服兩次，從第 1 天至第 12 天，每3 週為 1 個治療週期)
-- The primary end point= response rate (RR)
-- Secondary end points: PFS, disease control rate (DCR), OS, safety, and correlative analyses.

*d-2 研究結果
-- RR: 74.1% vs 65.2% (P = 0.55) 兩組均超過預先設定的療效閾值。(Figure12)
-- DCR: 100% vs 78.3%(P = 0.02)
-- mPFS: 10.1 個月 vs 9.7 個月(P = 0.73)
-- mOS: 15.5 個月 vs 16.4 個月(P = 0.6)
-- 2yr OS(entire cohort) 30.6%、3yr OS(entire cohort) 17.8% 
-- 3 至 4 級血液學毒性 A 組較多: Neutropenia 13(48%) vs 7(30%)、Thrombocytopenia 15(55%) vs 2(9%)、Anemia 14(52%) vs 8(35%)

*d-3 結論
Cisplatin and gemcitabine is an effective regimen in advanced gBRCA/PALB2+ PDAC. Concurrent veliparib did not improve RR.

question:
Regarding the treatment of advanced hepatocellular carcinoma, which of the following statements are (is) correct?
(1) Preferred first line treatment choice for Child Pugh A HCC patient is atezolizumab + bevacizumab or tremelimumab + durvalumab.
(2) Subsequent-line systemic therapy for disease progression option could be cabozantinib, regorafenib, lenvatinib or sorafenib.
(3) Subsequent-line systemic therapy for disease progression could be ramucirumab for those with AFP ≥400 ng/mL.
(4) Immune checkpoint inhibition has shown clinical benefit in HCC patients without selection for microsatellite instability (MSI), mismatch repair (MMR), tumor mutational burden (TMB), or programmed death ligand 1 (PD-L1) testing status.
explanation:
(1) Preferred first line treatment choice for Child Pugh A HCC patient is atezolizumab + bevacizumab or tremelimumab + durvalumab.
Correct! (for unresectable HCC)
*NCCN Guidelines Version 4.2024,  HCC-5、 HCC-I 1 OF 2 (Figure1)
-First-Line Systemic Therapy
--Preferred Regimens
--• Atezolizumabd + bevacizumab (category 1) (*a: Updated IMbrave150)
--• Tremelimumab-actl + durvalumab (category 1) (*b: HIMALAYA trial) 
-- Caution: 所列的治療方式在 Child B or C liver function 的safety data很有限

*相關trial (2篇)
*a Cheng AL, Qin S, Ikeda M, et al. Updated efficacy and safety data from IMbrave150: Atezolizumab plus bevacizumab vs. sorafenib for unresectable hepatocellular carcinoma. J Hepatol 2022;76:862-873.
*a-1研究方法
-- open-label, phase III study
-- 未接受過全身性治療且不可切除的HCC
-- 2:1的比例隨機分配至：Atezolizumab+bevacizumab 或是 Sorafenib組別
(Atezolizumab 1,200 mg + Bevacizumab 15 mg/kg Q3wk)
(Sorafenib 400 mg BID)
-- Co-primary endpoints= OS and PFS
-- Secondary efficacy endpoints= objective response rates(ORR)、exploratory subgroup efficacy analyses.

*a-2研究結果
--共501病人(ITT)，A+B(n = 336)、Sorafenib(n = 165)(Figure2)
--mOS: 19.2 個月 vs 13.4 個月，HR 0.66, descriptive p <0.001
--mPFS: 6.9 個月 vs 4.3 個月，HR 0.65, descriptive p <0.001
--治療相關的 3/4 級AE: 143 人(43%，n = 329) vs 72 人(46%，n = 156)
--治療相關的 5 級AE: 6 人(2%) vs 1 人(<1%)
--Objective response: 97人(30%) vs 18人(11%)(Figure3)

*a-3結論
IMbrave150 (Published May 13, 2020 N Engl J Med 2020;382:1894-1905)的主要分析顯示，A+B相較於Sorafenib，在advanced HCC 患者中具有顯著更大的療效優勢，但當時survival data尚未成熟。在12 個月後進行的更新分析中，顯示A+B組的mOS較 Sorafenib 組延長 5.8 個月，且治療相關AE的嚴重程度與先前結果相似。這些更新結果進一步確認，A+B已成為advanced HCC的一線標準治療

*b Abou-Alfa GK, Lau G, Kudo M, et al. Tremelimumab plus durvalumab in unresectable hepatocellular carcinoma. NEJM Evid 2022;1:EVIDoa2100070.
*b-1研究方法
-- open-label, phase 3 trial
-- 未接受過全身性治療且不可切除的HCC
-- 隨機分配至3組: Tremelimumab+Durvalumab、單用durvalumab、Sorafenib
(Tremelimumab 300 mg 單次給藥+ Durvaluma 1500 mg q4wks)= STRIDE (Single Tremelimumab Regular Interval Durvalumab) 
(單用durvalumab 1500 mg q4wks)
(Sorafenib 400 mg BID)
-- The primary endpoint= OS for STRIDE vs Sorafenib
-- The secondary objective= Noninferiority for OS for Durvalumab versus Sorafenib

*b-2研究結果
--N=1171：STRIDE(n = 393)、Durvalumab(n = 389)、或Sorafenib(n = 389)
--mOS: 16.43個月 vs 16.56 個月 vs 13.77 個月 (Figure4)
--> STRIDE 比起 Sorafenib，OS的HR= 0.78、P=0.0035
--> Durvalumab monotherapy不亞於 (noninferior to) sorafenib (HR, 0.86; 95.67% CI, 0.73 to 1.03; noninferiority margin, 1.08)
--Overall survival at 36 months: 30.7% vs 24.7% vs 20.2%
--mPFS: 三組沒有差異(Figure5)
--治療相關的 3/4 級AE: 50.5% vs 37.1% vs 52.4%
 
*b-3結論
For unresectable HCC
--STRIDE significantly improved OS versus sorafenib. 
--Durvalumab monotherapy was noninferior to sorafenib.


(2) Subsequent-line systemic therapy for disease progression option could be cabozantinib, regorafenib, lenvatinib or sorafenib.
Correct! 
*NCCN Guidelines Version 4.2024, HCC-I 1 OF 2
- Subsequent-Line Systemic Therapy if Disease Progression
-- Options 
-- • Cabozantinib (category 1) (*c)
-- • Regorafenib (category 1) (*d) 
-- • Lenvatinib 
-- • Sorafenib
-- 1線治療之後，目前缺乏比較數據來確定最佳治療選擇


*相關trial (2篇)
*c Abou-Alfa GK, Meyer T, Cheng AL, et al. Cabozantinib in patients with advanced and progressing hepatocellular carcinoma. N Engl J Med 2018;379:54-63.
*c-1研究方法
-- Randomized, double-blind, phase 3 trial
-- 收錄曾接受Sorafenib治療，用過1-2線全身治療後progression的病人
-- Cabozantinib 抑制tyrosine kinases (包含VEGFR 1, 2, and 3, MET, and AXL)
-- N= 707, 隨機2:1分配至 Cabozantinib (60 mg QD) 或 Placebo
-- The primary end point= OS
-- The secondary end point= PFS, ORR

*c-2研究結果
--mOS: 10.2 個月 vs 8.0 個月 (HR for death, 0.76; P=0.005)(Figure6)
--mPFS: 5.2 個月 vs 1.9 個月 (HR for disease progression or death, 0.44; P<0.001)(Figure7)
--ORR: 4% vs <1% (P=0.009)
--Grade 3 or 4 AEs: Cabozantinib多於安慰劑組別 68% vs 36%
--> palmar–plantar erythrodysesthesia (17% vs. 0%), hypertension (16% vs. 2%), AST上升 (12% vs. 7%), fatigue (10% vs. 4%), and diarrhea (10% vs. 2%).

*c-3結論
--在先前接受過治療的advanced HCC, Cabozantinib 比起安慰劑有更長的OS與PFS，但也有更多的high-grade AE (約為2倍)


*d Bruix J, Qin S, Merle P, et al. Regorafenib for patients with hepatocellular carcinoma who progressed on sorafenib treatment (RESORCE): a randomized, double blind, placebo-controlled, phase 3 trial. Lancet 2017;389:56-66.

*d-1研究方法
--Randomised, double-blind, parallel-group, phase 3 trial
--收錄under Sorafenib治療(≥400 mg/day for ≥20 of last 28 days of treatment)，卻PD的病人，需 Child-Pugh A
--隨機2:1分配至 口服 Regorafenib 或 另一組 安慰劑 ，兩組都有最佳支持治療(BSC)
(Regorafenib 160 mg QD，吃三周休一周，4周為一循環)
-- The primary end point= OS

*d-2研究結果
--N=573隨機分配，Regorafenib 379、Placebo 194 (For efficacy analyses)
--N=567接受治療，Regorafenib 374、Placebo 193 (For safety analyses)
--mOS: 10.6 個月 vs 7.8 個月 (HR 0.63;one-sided p<0·0001) (Figure8)
--AEs: 100% vs 93%
--Grade 3 or 4 AEs: Regorafenib組多於Placebo
--> hypertension 57(15%) vs 9(5%)， hand–foot skin reaction 47(13%) vs 1(1%), fatigue 34(9%) vs 9(5%), and diarrhoea 12(3%) vs 0
--治療相關死亡(Grade 5 AE): 共發生88例(50 vs 38)，其中有9例被認為與試驗藥物相關，Regorafenib 組 7 例(2%)、安慰劑組 2 例(1%、為肝衰竭)

*d-3Interpretation
Regorafenib is the only systemic treatment shown to provide survival benefit in HCC patients progressing on sorafenib treatment.

(3) Subsequent-line systemic therapy for disease progression could be ramucirumab for those with AFP ≥400 ng/mL.
Correct!
*NCCN Guidelines Version 4.2024, HCC-I 1 OF 2 (Figure9)
- Subsequent-Line Systemic Therapy if Disease Progression
-- Useful in Certain Circumstances
-- • Ramucirumab (AFP ≥400 ng/mL) (category 1) (*e =REACH-2 trial)
-- • Nivolumab 
-- • For MSI-H/dMMR tumors: Dostarlimab-gxly (category 2B) 
-- • For RET gene fusion-positive tumors: Selpercatinib (category 2B)

*相關trial (1篇)
*e Zhu AX, Kang YK, Yen CJ, et al. Ramucirumab after sorafenib in patients with advanced hepatocellular carcinoma and increased α-fetoprotein concentrations (REACH-2): A randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled, phase 3 trial. Lancet Oncol 2019;20:282-296.

*e-1研究方法
--Randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled, phase 3 trial
--符合條件需要年滿 18 歲，並且具備以下條件：
--1.經組織學或細胞學確診為HCC，或肝硬化合併 HCC
--2.BCLC B 期或 C 期疾病
--3.Child-Pugh A 級肝功能
--4.ECOG 0 或 1
--5.AFP ≥400 ng/mL
--6.曾接受 Sorafenib 一線治療
--隨機分配2:1至 Ramucirumab 組(8 mg/kg Q2wks)或 安慰劑組，兩組均有最佳支持治療(BSC)
--The primary end point= OS
--The secondary endpoints= PFS、ORR、time to radiographic progression, safety, time to deterioration in scores on the Functional Assessment of Cancer Therapy Hepatobiliary Symptom Index 8 (FHSI-8), and time to deterioration in ECOG
--此研究還合併分析了 REACH-2 及 REACH(NCT01140347)試驗中 AFP 濃度 ≥400 ng/mL 的患者個體數據

*e-2研究結果
--N=292, Ramucirumab 197、Placebo 95
--Ramucirumab 組相較於安慰劑組，OS和PFS均顯著改善
--mOS: 8.5 個月 vs 7.3 個月，HR 0.710、p = 0.0199 (Figure10)
--PFS: 2.8 個月 vs 1.6 個月，HR 0.452、p < 0.0001
--ORR未達統計學差異: 9 人(5%) vs 1 人(1%)、p = 0.1697
--FHSI-8 總分惡化時間未達統計學差異: 3.7 個月 vs 2.8 個月、HR 0.799、p = 0.238
--ECOG 惡化時間未達統計學差異: HR 1.082、p = 0.77
--3 級以上治療相關不良事件(發生率 ≥5%): 高血壓 25 例(13%) vs 5 例(5%)、低鈉血症 11 例(6%) vs 0 例、AST升高 6 例(3%) vs 5 例(5%)
--任何級別的嚴重不良事件(SAEs，無論原因): 68 例(35%) vs 28 例(29%)
--與治療相關的死亡事件: Ramucirumab 組有3例判定為與試驗治療相關：AKI、hepatorenal syndrome、Renal failure 
 
*e-3結論
--Ramucirumab 相較於安慰劑能改善 曾接受 Sorafenib 治療且 AFP 濃度至少 400 ng/mL 之HCC患者的OS。
--Ramucirumab was well tolerated, with a manageable safety profile


(4) Immune checkpoint inhibition has shown clinical benefit in HCC patients without selection for microsatellite instability (MSI), mismatch repair (MMR), tumor mutational burden (TMB), or programmed death ligand 1 (PD-L1) testing status.
Correct!
-In Nivolumab, 相關trial=CheckMate 040 指出 All responses occurred early in treatment. Responses were observed regardless of baseline etiology and PD-L1 status.(Figure11)
-In A+B, 相關trial=IMbrave150 指出 The predictive value of PDL1 status for the efficacy of PDL1 and PD1 inhibitors or combination therapies has not been clearly shown in the case of HCC.
-MSI and MMR Deficiency: MSI-high tumors在HCC不常見(<3%)，MSI is not a practical biomarker for predicting responses to ICIs in HCC patients. (Figure12)
-TMB: HCC通常表現low tumor mutational burden (TMB). This low TMB suggests that it is unlikely to serve as a relevant biomarker for ICI response in the majority of HCC patients. (Figure13)
*相關trial
--CheckMate 040: Efficacy and Safety of Nivolumab + Ipilimumab in Patients With Advanced HCC Previously Treated With Sorafenib 
--IMbrave150 
--Current Evidence for Immune Checkpoint Inhibition in Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma, Curr. Oncol. 2023, 30(9), 8665-868

question:
Regarding the treatment choice of unresectable and metastatic biliary tract adenocarcinoma, which of the following statements are (is) correct?
(1) Durvalumab + gemcitabine + cisplatin or pembrolizumab + gemcitabine + cisplatin is preferred first-line systemic therapy regimens.
(2) The most common therapeutic targets (more than 10%) are FGFR2 fusion or rearrangement and IDH1 mutation in common bile duct adenocarcinoma.
(3) For MSI-H/dMMR tumors pembrolizumab treatment could be recommended.
(4) Germline testing is recommended for all patients with unresectable or metastatic BTC who are candidates for systemic therapy.
explanation:
(1) Durvalumab + gemcitabine + cisplatin or pembrolizumab + gemcitabine + cisplatin is preferred first-line systemic therapy regimens.
Correct!
*NCCN Guidelines Version 6.2024, BIL-C 2 OF 5 (Figure1)
-Primary Treatment for Unresectable and Metastatic Disease
--Preferred Regimens
--• Durvalumab + gemcitabine + cisplatin (category 1) (*a=TOPAZ-1 trial)
--• Pembrolizumab + gemcitabine + cisplatin (category 1) (*b=KEYNOTE-966)
--補充
--> Durvalumab + gemcitabine + cisplatin 也適用於在根治性手術後超過6個月且adjuvant therapy 完成後超過6個月復發的患者
--> 若作為後線治療使用，應限於未曾接受過checkpoint inhibitor治療的患者，因為目前缺乏針對已接受checkpoint inhibitor後再使用immunotherapy的相關數據。


相關trial (2篇)
*a Oh DY, He AR, Qin S, et al. Durvalumab plus gemcitabine and cisplatin in advanced biliary tract cancer. NEJM Evid 2022;1:EVIDoa2200015. 
*a-1研究方法
--double-blind, placebo-controlled, phase 3 study
--先前未接受治療的不可切除或轉移性膽道癌患者，或復發性疾病患者
--1:1 隨機分配，接受Durvalumab 或安慰劑，兩組均合併gemcitabine + cisplatin治療，最多八個週期，隨後單獨使用durvalumab 或安慰劑until disease progression or unacceptable toxicity.
--The primary objective= OS
--The secondary end points= PFS, ORR, Safety.

*a-2研究結果
--N=685，Durvalumab組(n=341)、Placebo組(n=344)
--Data cutoff時，Durvalumab 組198名患者(58.1%)和安慰劑組226名患者(65.7%)已死亡
--mOS: 12.8個月 vs 11.5個月，HR for OS= 0.80，P=0.021 (Figure2)
--mPFS: 7.2個月 vs 5.7個月，HR for PFS= 0.75，P=0.001
--ORR: 26.7% vs 18.7% (Figure3)
--3或4級AE: 75.7% vs 77.8%

*a-3結論
--Durvalumab + chemotherapy顯著提高OS，也改善PFS and ORR. 兩組的safety profiles沒有差異


*b Kelley RK, Ueno M, Yoo C, et al. Pembrolizumab in combination with gemcitabine and cisplatin compared with gemcitabine and cisplatin alone for patients with advanced biliary tract cancer (KEYNOTE-966): A randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled, phase 3 trial. Lancet 2023;401:1853-1865.
*b-1研究方法
--Randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled, phase 3 trial
--收錄滿18歲、未接受過治療的、不可切除的locally advanced or metastatic膽道癌；ECOG 0 或 1
--依 1:1 隨機分配至Pembrolizumab組 或 安慰劑組，兩者均Q3wks (最多 35 個療程)，且兩組均合併Gemcitabine+Cisplatin
(Pembrolizumab 200mg Q3wk)
(Gemcitabine 1000 mg/m²，於第 1 天和第 8 天給予，Q3wks，無最高治療限制)
(Cisplatin 25 mg/m²，於第 1 天和第 8 天給予，Q3wks，最多 8 個療程)
--The primary objective= OS (ITT)
--The secondary endpoint= Safety (as-treated)

*b-2研究結果
--N=1069，Pembrolizumab組(n=533)、Placebo組(n=536)
--mOS: 12·7個月 vs 10·9個月，HR= 0·83，one-sided p=0·0034 [significance threshold, p=0·0200] (Figure4)
--3或4級AE: 420(79%) vs 400(75%)
--Treatment-related 3或4級AE: 369(70%) vs 367(69%)
--因為AE而死亡: 31(6%) vs 49(9%) [其中 8(2%) vs 3(1%) 被認定與治療相關]

*b-3結論
--Pembrolizumab plus gemcitabine and cisplatin改善OS，且沒有新的safety signals--> a new treatment option for patients with previously untreated metastatic or unresectable BTC.


(2) The most common therapeutic targets (more than 10%) are FGFR2 fusion or rearrangement and IDH1 mutation in common bile duct adenocarcinoma.
Incorrect! FGFR2 fusion or rearrangement, IDH1 mutation均是在 intrahepatic CCAs多，其他subsites為rare表現
*NCCN Guidelines Version 6.2024, BIL-B 1-3 OF 8
-Molecular profiling in BTCs: Comprehensive molecular profiling is recommended for patients with unresectable or metastatic BTC who are candidates for systemic therapy. If tissue is too scant or not available, consider repeat biopsy depending on tumor accessibility, safety, and clinical context. A cell-free DNA (cfDNA) test may also be considered for identifying gene mutations. This technique may not reliably identify gene fusions or rearrangements depending on the panel used and the specific partner gene. 
(Figure5,6,7)
--NTRK fusion: <1%
--MSI-H/dMMR: 1%–3%
--TMB-H: <5%
--BRAF V600E mutation: 1%–5% 
--FGFR2 fusion or rearrangement: 9%–15% of intrahepatic CCAs and rare in other subsites
--IDH1 mutation: 10%–20% of intrahepatic CCAs and rare in other subsites
--HER2 (ERBB2) overexpression and/or amplification: 5%–20% of CCAs, 15%–30% of gallbladder cancer
--RET fusion: <1%
--KRAS G12C mutation: 1%


(3) For MSI-H/dMMR tumors pembrolizumab treatment could be recommended.
Correct!
*NCCN Guidelines Version 6.2024, BIL-B 4 OF 8, BIL-C 3 OF 5 (Figure8)
-在unresecatble or metastatic gallbladder cancer, intrahepatic CCA, or extrahepatic CCA 建議要驗MSI/dMMR
-- 若為MSI-H/dMMR tumors，第一線Targeted Tx建議Pembrolizumab、Subsequent-Line 建議Pembrolizumab、Dostarlimab-gxly (category 2B)

相關trial (2篇)
*c Marabelle A, Le DT, Ascierto PA, et al. Efficacy of pembrolizumab in patients with noncolorectal high microsatellite instability/mismatch repair-deficient cancer: Results from the phase II KEYNOTE-158 study. J Clin Oncol 2020;38:1-10.
*c-1研究方法
--Histologically/cytologically confirmed MSI-H/dMMR
--Advanced noncolorectal cancer + 先前治療失敗
--符合上述條件的病人接受pembrolizumab 200 mg Q3wks for 2 years (或直到PD、無法耐受的toxicity、病人withdrawal)
--Median follow up was 13.4 months. 
--The primary end point= ORR

*c-2研究結果
--N=233, 子宮內膜癌、胃癌、膽管癌和胰腺癌最為常見 (全部27種tumor types)
--ORR= 34.3% (Figure9)
--mPFS= 4.1個月、mOS= 23.5個月
--TRAE= 151=(64.8%)
--- Gr3-5= 34(14.6%)、無其他與治療相關的致命不良事件

-- Cholangiocarcinoma cohort: 
-- ORR= 40.9%, mPFS= 4.2個月、mOS= 24.3個月

*c-3結論
--對於先前接受治療的不可切除或轉移性MSI-H/dMMR非結直腸癌患者，Anti–PD1 (pembrolizumab) 具有臨床益處。其毒性與之前使用pembrolizumab的經驗一致。


*d Maio M, Ascierto PA, Manzyuk L, et al. Pembrolizumab in microsatellite instability high or mismatch repair deficient cancers: Updated analysis from the phase II KEYNOTE-158 study. Ann Oncol 2022;33:929-938.
*d-1研究方法
--與前一篇均為KEYNOTE-158 study
--Longer follow-up: previously treated advanced MSI-H/dMMR noncolorectal cancers
--Median time from first dose to database cut-off 37.5 個月

*d-2研究結果
--ORR= 30.8%(Figure10)
--mPFS= 3.5 個月、mOS= 20.1 個月個月
--Median duration of response= 47.5 months
--TRAE= 227(64.7%)
--- Gr3-4= 39(11.1%)、Gr5= 3(0.9%)

-- Cholangiocarcinoma cohort: 
-- ORR= 40.9%, mPFS= 4.2個月、mOS= 19.4個月

*d-3結論
--Pembrolizumab demonstrated clinically meaningful and durable benefit, with a high ORR of 30.8%, long median duration of response of 47.5 months, and manageable safety across a range of heavily pretreated, advanced MSI-H/dMMR noncolorectal cancers, providing support for use of pembrolizumab in this setting.


(4) Germline testing is recommended for all patients with unresectable or metastatic BTC who are candidates for systemic therapy.
Incorrect!
*NCCN Guidelines Version 6.2024, BIL-B 1 OF 8
 Recommendations:
--Germline testing in hepatobiliary cancers
--> 是否行germline testing尚無足夠證據可用於制定明確的標準，也無證據支持進行universal germline testing。
--> 若患者具備以下任一特徵，可以考慮檢測：診斷時年齡較輕、個人或家族癌症病史顯著、無已知liver disease危險因子，或腫瘤基因檢測中發現可能為germline alterations。
--> 已知攜帶與cancer predisposing syndrome相關的germline mutation的患者（如Lynch syndrome or hereditary breast and ovarian cancer syndrome），目前仍缺乏足夠證據支持針對膽道惡性腫瘤進行篩檢。

(原文: Evidence remains insufficient for definitive recommendations regarding specific criteria to guide genetic risk assessment in hepatobiliary cancers or for universal germline testing in these tumors. In BTCs, genetic counseling referral and potential germline testing should be considered in patients with any of the following characteristics: young age at diagnosis; a strong personal or family history of cancer; no known risk factors for liver disease; or presence of mutations identified during tumor testing that are suspected to be possible germline alterations. For patients who do harbor a known germline mutation associated with a cancer predisposing syndrome (ie, Lynch syndrome or hereditary breast and ovarian cancer syndrome), there is currently insufficient evidence to support screening for biliary tract malignancies.)

question:
下列關於大腸直腸癌HER2-amplification的敘述，正確的有？
(1) 在大腸直腸癌，HER2高表現的病患約有2-5%，且可能與anti-EGFR 藥物使用的抗藥性有關。
(2) 在兩線化學治療失敗後，在HER2高表現，RAS-wild type 的大腸直腸癌病患，可考慮使用trastuzumab + tucatinib。
(3) 根據DESTINY-CRC02，單獨使用T-DXd無論RAS-mutant或wild type，其response rate 約為35%。
(4) 根據DESTINY-CRC01，在low HER2 (IHC2+/ISH-或IHC1+) 的病患使用T-DXd依然有約40%的response rate。
explanation:
(1) 在大腸直腸癌，HER2高表現的病患約有2-5%，且可能與anti-EGFR 藥物使用的抗藥性有關。
Correct!
*NCCN Guidelines Version 1.2025 MS-49 (Figure1)
--HER2 is rarely amplified/overexpressed in CRC(approximately 3% overall), but the prevalence is higher in RAS/BRAF–wild type tumors (reported at 5%–14%).
--目前無證據證實 HER2 overexpression在預後的角色
--除了是HER2-targeted therapy的predictive marker, HER2 amplification/overexpression也與EGFR-targeting monoclonal antibodies的抗藥性有關!

*參考trial: Raghav K, Loree JM, Morris JS, et al. Validation of HER2 Amplification as a Predictive Biomarker for Anti–Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Antibody Therapy in Metastatic Colorectal Cancer. JCO Precision Oncology 2019:1-13. 
--研究對象：98 名 RAS/BRAF–wild type mCRC
--不使用 EGFR inhibitor時，無論 HER2 狀態如何，median PFS相似。
--使用 EGFR inhibitor時，HER2 amplification患者的 PFS 顯著較短(2.8 個月 vs. 8.1 個月)。
--HR：7.05(95% CI, 3.4–14.9)。
--P < .001
--結論：in RAS/RAF wild-type mCRC，HER2 amplification與anti-EGFRab therapy的抗藥性/療效有關。

(2) 在兩線化學治療失敗後，在HER2高表現，RAS-wild type 的大腸直腸癌病患，可考慮使用trastuzumab + tucatinib。
Correct!
*NCCN Guidelines Version 1.2025, COL-D 2 OF 12 (Figure2)

*參考trial: Strickler JH, Cercek A, Siena S, et al. Additional analyses of MOUNTAINEER: A phase II study of tucatinib and trastuzumab for HER2-positive mCRC [abstract]. Ann Oncol 2022;33:S808-S869.
-研究方法
--收錄18歲以上、chemotherapy-refractory, HER2-positive, RAS wild-type unresectable or metastatic CRC
--Cohort A: Tucatinib (300 mgBID) + intravenous trastuzumab(8 mg/kg loading, then 6 mg/kg Q3wks)->打到progression
--中途有擴大招募: 以4:3分至兩組
--> Cohort B= tucatinib + trastuzumab 
--> Cohort C= tucatinib monotherapy
--The primary endpoint= objective response rate for cohorts A and B combined and was assessed in patients in the full analysis set (ie, patients with HER2-positive disease who received at least one dose of study treatment).
-結果
--114 人 HER2 陽性並接受治療(Cohort A: 45, B: 39, C: 30)
--ORR: 38.1%(Figure3)
--AE: 
--> A+B: 腹瀉(64%)、3 級以上：高血壓(7%)、3%(3/86) tucatinib 相關嚴重不良事件（急性腎損傷、結腸炎、疲勞)
--> C: 腹瀉(33%)、3 級以上：ALT、AST 升高(各 7%)、1 人(3%) tucatinib 相關嚴重不良事件（藥物過量）、

-結論
--Tucatinib+trastuzumab: FDA approved for mCRC and is an important new treatment option for chemotherapy-refractory HER2-positive mCRC.

(3) 根據DESTINY-CRC02，單獨使用T-DXd無論RAS-mutant或wild type，其response rate 約為35%。
Incorrect! 在subgroup分析中，RAS-Wild-type的ORR優於RAS-mutant，可以看直接下方**Subgroup研究的資料 (Figure4,5,6)

*相關trial: Kanwal Raghav, et al.Trastuzumab deruxtecan in patients with HER2-positive advanced colorectal cancer (DESTINY-CRC02): primary results from a multicentre, randomised, phase 2 trial, The Lancet Oncology,Volume 25, Issue 9, 2024,1147-1162 
-目的: 探討 Trastuzumab deruxtecan 不同劑量(5·4 mg/kg and 6·4 mg/kg)在先前治療過的HER2(+), RAS wild-type or mutant mCRC，找出適合的劑量
-方法
-- 收錄年滿 18 歲或 20 歲(依地區而定)、先前治療過的unresectable,recurrent, or metastatic HER2-positive, and RAS wild-type or mutant colorectal cancer (先前治療chemotherapy, and anti-EGFR, anti-VEGF, or anti-PD-L1 therapy)
-- Stage 1: 1:1 的比例被隨機分配至接受 5.4 mg/kg 或 6.4 mg/kg 的 trastuzumab deruxtecan, Q21d
-- Stage 2: 所有患者均被分配至 5.4 mg/kg 的治療組
-- The primary endpoint= ORR
-研究結果
-- The confirmed ORR= 37·8% (5·4 mg/kg) vs 27·5% (6·4 mg/kg)
-- Gr3 以上drug-related AE 34 (41%) vs 19 (49%) 
-- **Subgroup研究
--> 在5·4 mg/kg組別的ORR: 39.7% (RAS wild-type) vs 28.6% (RAS mutant)
--> 在6·4 mg/kg組別的ORR: 32.4% (RAS wild-type) vs 0% (RAS mutant)
-結論: 在先前治療過的HER2-positive mCRC (有包含RAS mutations, 或先前接受anti-HER2 therapy)，trastuzumab deruxtecan 單用，5·4 mg/kg是最佳的劑量

(4) 根據DESTINY-CRC01，在low HER2 (IHC2+/ISH-或IHC1+) 的病患使用T-DXd依然有約40%的response rate。
Incorrect! ORR為0
*相關trial: Salvatore Siena MD, et al. Trastuzumab deruxtecan (DS-8201) in patients with HER2-expressing metastatic colorectal cancer (DESTINY-CRC01): a multicentre, open-label, phase 2 trial. The Lancet Oncology,Volume 22, Issue 6, 2021,779-789

-目的: 探討 Trastuzumab deruxtecan的anti-tumor activity與安全性，在HER2(+)的mutant mCRC
-方法
-- 需年滿 18 歲（日本為 20 歲以上）
-- HER2-expressing metastatic colorectal cancer、且已接受兩種以上先前治療後惡化(可接受除了trastuzumab deruxtecan以外的HER2-targeted therapies)、且 RAS and BRAFV600E wild-type
-- 依照 HER2 表現程度 分為3個cohort
--> Cohort A：HER2 陽性（即 IHC3+ 或 IHC2+ 且 ISH 陽性）
--> Cohort B：HER2 低表現（IHC2+ 且 ISH 陰性）
--> Cohort C：HER2 低表現（IHC1+）
-- 所有患者接受 6.4 mg/kg trastuzumab deruxtecan Q3wk，直至疾病進展、出現不可接受的不良反應、withdrawal，或死亡。
--The primary endpoint= ORR in cohort A、safety

-研究結果
-- ORR= 24(45.3%) in cohort A
-- 3 or worse treatment-emergent adverse events that occurred in at least 10% of all participants
-- **對於Cohort B and Cohort C的分析 (Figure7)
--> 均無患者達到客觀緩解(ORR)
--> mPFS 在cohort B and C相似: 1.3 個月 and 1.4 個月
--> mOS 在cohort B and C: not reached
--> PD or Death: Cohort B (4名)、Cohort C (14名)
----

此題覺得答案為(1)(2)
(審稿附議)

question:
一位 47 歲病患診斷為 cT3N2M1 之 sigmoid colon adenocarcinoma，有多處肺轉移及肝臟 轉移，為無法手術之疾病(unresectable)，病理檢測為 RASwt、BRAFwt、pMMR，病患之 ECOG PS 0 且無腸阻塞、出血等症狀。下列對於此病患的治療建議中，正確的有? 

(1)  根據 FIRE-3 study，cetuximab + FOLFIRI 相較於 bevacizumab + FOLFIRI，其 OS benefit 只有在 RAS-wild type 且腫瘤位於左側大腸時才顯著。 
(2)  Cetuximab + FOLFIRI 在 RAS-wild type 且腫瘤位於左側大腸的病患，其 response rate 約為 7 成，且其 early tumor shrinkage 及 depth of response 皆優於 bevacizumab + FOLFIRI。 
(3)  當病患在一線使用 bevacizumab + FOLFOX，可在疾病惡化時使用 FOLFIRI 加上 ramucirumab 或是繼續使用 bevacizumab。 
(4)  Panitumumab 相較於 cetuximab 有較多的 Grade 3 以上的 infusion reaction，但有較少 的 hypomagnesaemia 風險。
explanation:
(1)(2) 正確，在 FIRE-3 的後續報告中，RAS wild type mCRC 的 median OS 在左大腸且接受 FOLFIRI + Cetuximab 的組別可達到 38.2 個月， FOLFIRI + Bevacizumab 只有 28.2 個月。“FOLFIRI plus cetuximab resulted in a significantly higher ORR and longer OS compared to FOLFIRI plus bevacizumab among patients with left-sided tumours” (fig1)
 
參考同篇論文 appendix，RAS-wild type left-sided mCRC，在 FOLFIRI + Cetuximab 的組別比起 FOLFIRI + Bevacizumab 有較佳的 ORR (69% vs 62%), early tumor shrinkage (71% vs 50%), depth of response (50% vs 33%)。(fig2)
 
Ref: British Journal of Cancer (2021) 124:587–594; https://doi.org/10.1038/s41416-020-01140-9 

(3) 正確，根據 NCCN guideline ver. 1.2025 Colon cancer“Another meta-analysis showed an OS and PFS benefit to continuing an anti-angiogenic agent after progression on an anti- angiogenic agent in first-line “，在 MS-68 中內文提到幾個 clinical trial 研究 contiuation of bevacizumab plus another chemotherapy regimen following progression on bevacizumab
“Overall, these data (along with data from the VELOUR trial, discussed below) show that the continuation of VEGF blockade in second-line therapy offers a very modest but statistically significant OS benefit. “
Ramucirumab 的部分，則參考 phase III RAISE study，OS 有達到統計學上顯著差異，FOLFIRI + Ramucirumab versus FOLFIRI + placebo (13.3 vs 11.7個月; HR: 0.844)。(fig3)(fig4)
 

(4) 錯誤，此選項可以從藥物機轉刪除。“Cetuximab and panitumumab are monoclonal antibodies directed against EGFR that inhibit its downstream signaling pathways. Panitumumab is a fully human monoclonal antibody, whereas cetuximab is a chimeric monoclonal antibody. ”“ Administration of either cetuximab or panitumumab has been associated with severe infusion reactions, including anaphylaxis, in 3% and 1% of patients, respectively. “
由於 Cetuximab 是 chimeric antibody，帶有不同物種的分子，因此較容易造成過敏反應，給藥時容易有輸注反應 (infusion reaction)；相較 panitumumab 都是人類的分子，過敏的機率就低很多。
至於anti-EGFR monoclonal antibody 造成的低血鎂，有文獻指出這與 blockade of the EGFR in the kidney 相關。沒有找到兩種藥物 head to head 比較的臨床試驗，不過是有找到一篇 systematic reivew 當中 pooled analysis，看到 cetuximab 發生低血鎂的比例比起 panitumumab 還要高。(fig5)
 
Ref: 
1. NCCN guideline v1.2025 Colon cancer MS-61
2. Petrelli, F. et al. (2011) ‘Risk of anti-EGFR monoclonal antibody-related hypomagnesemia: systematic review and pooled analysis of randomized studies’, Expert Opinion on Drug Safety, 11(sup1), pp. S9–S19. doi: 10.1517/14740338.2011.606213.

question:
下列關於 Appendiceal neoplasm 的敘述，正確的有? 
(1)  病理下可分為 low-grade/high-grade mucinous neoplasm, appendiceal adenocarcinoma 及 neuroendocrine tumor。 
(2)  Signet ring mucinous adenocarcinoma 的預後很差。 
(3)  若腹膜轉移的病患可使用 PCI (peritoneal cancer index)評估是否可手術切除，若可手術切除，可在術前接受六個月的前導性化學治療並隨後加上 HIPEC (hyperthermic intraperitoneal chemotherapy)。 
(4)  無法手術的病患，應接受與大腸癌相同的基因檢測(RAS, BRAF, MMR, HER2)及治療選擇。
explanation:
這段文字出自 NCCN version 1.2025 colon cancer MS-9～MS-13
(1) 正確，”Appendiceal neoplasms can be histopathologically classified as neuroendocrine neoplasms (NENs), mucinous neoplasms, goblet cell adenocarcinomas (GCAs), colonic-type adenocarcinomas (non- mucinous), and signet ring cell carcinomas (epithelial origin).”

(2) 正確，”It has been well-established that the presence of signet ring cells leads to a poorer prognosis; 10% to 40% of patients with G3 (poorly differentiated) mucinous adenocarcinoma with signet ring cells have a 5-year OS.”

(3) 正確，”In select patients diagnosed with metastatic spread to the peritoneum, CRS and HIPEC have the potential to be curative.”
“The intent of CRS is to achieve maximum cytoreduction before the initiation of HIPEC. Because of this, presurgical evaluation of peritoneal involvement is recommended and can be achieved through laparoscopy and the peritoneal carcinomatosis index (PCI) scoring system. The PCI quantifies the distribution of tumors throughout 13 regions of the abdomen and pelvis along with a lesion size score.” “Once an individual is deemed a candidate for CRS/HIPEC they should continue chemotherapy for up to 6 months, preferably in the neoadjuvant setting.”

(4) 正確，”Cytotoxic chemotherapy with efficacy against CRC is used to treat AA. It is reasonable to use other targeted therapy options for MSI-high (MSI-H), BRAF mutation, or HER2 status, which is consistent with recommendations within the NCCN Guidelines for Colon Cancer and NCCN Guidelines for Rectal Cancer. There is no clear evidence for anti-epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR) therapy even if the patient’s tumor is RAS/RAF wild-type.”

question:
42 歲男性，經診斷肛門緣上 1.5cm Low rectal adenocarcinoma, cT4aN2aM0, circumferential resection margin involved, stage IIIC，IHC 發現 MLH1/PMS2 loss, preserved MSH2/6，RASwt 及 BRAFwt，此病患之 ECOG PS 為 0，無阻塞或出血症狀，關於此病患的治療建議， 下列敘述中，正確的有? 
(1)  病患可先使用 dostarlimab 六個月並根據評估後決定是否接受 chemoradiation (CRT) 及手術。 
(2)  在 CRT 後接受化學治療並後手術，相較於先接受化學治療後 CRT 再手術，有更高的 pCR 機率。 
(3)  clinical CR 的定義為:內視鏡下腸壁光滑且 MRI T2W 下只有 dark signal 且無>5mm lymph node。 
(4)  對於 Total neoadjuvant therapy 後達到 cCR 的病患，可考慮 watch-and-wait 而不進行手術。
explanation:
(1) 正確，病患為 dMMR locally advanced stage IIIC rectal cancer，根據 NCCN guideline 可以先進行 neoadjuvant immune chekcpoint inhibitor 六個月，評估療效。(fig1)
 
(2) 正確，CAO/ARO/AIO-12 這篇 randomized phase II trial，回應了optimal sequence of chemoradiotherapy (CRT) and chemotherapy before total mesorectal excision surgery for total neoadjuvant therapy in rectal cancer。

This secondary analysis of a randomized clinical trial showed that CRT followed by chemotherapy resulted in higher pathological complete response without compromising disease-free survival, toxicity, QoL, or stool incontinence and is thus proposed as the preferred total neoadjuvant therapy sequence if organ preservation is a priority.

Ref:  JAMA Oncol. 2022;8(1):e215445. doi:10.1001/jamaoncol.2021.5445

(3) 正確，Clinical complete response，根據NCCN version 2025.1 colon cancer page REC-H 1 OF 2 的定義如 fig2。
 
(4) 正確，在接受 total neoadjuvant therapy 後如果達到 clinical complete response，可以考慮 active surveillance (fig3)，目的是減少手術後可能伴隨的功能喪失，例如 incontinence, permanent colostomy 等等。目前支持 active surveillance 的研究多半是 phase II trial。

question:
下列關於大腸直腸癌 RAS 突變的敘述，錯誤的有?
(1) 最常見的 KRAS 突變為 KRAS G12D。
(2) 在 FIRE-3 臨床試驗中，次族群分析發現 RAS 突變之大腸癌病患接受 cetuximab + FOLFIRI 相較於 bevacizumab + FOLFIRI 有更差的PFS。
(3) 在 CodeBreaK300 中，sotorasib + panitumumab 相較於 triflufluridine- tipiracil 或 regorafenib 有較佳的 PFS。
(4) 在 KRYSTAL-1 中，adagrasib + cetuximab 相較於 triflufluridine-tipiracil 或 regorafenib 有較佳的 PFS。
explanation:
(1) 正確，根據 NCCN v.2025.1 MS-47 colon cancer 的描述
“Studies have reported that around 40% of mCRC have KRAS mutations in codons 12 and 13. Of these mutations, KRAS G12D was mostly commonly found (36%), followed by G12V (21.8%), and G13D (18.8%). KRAS G12C has been reported in around 17% of KRAS-mutated mCRC cases.”

(2) 正確，根據 FIRE-3 appendix，RAS-mutant population 接受 cetuximab + FOLFIRI 相較於 bevacizumab + FOLFIRI 的 median PFS 為 7.5個月比上9.6個月。(fig1)
 
(3) 正確。CodeBreaK 300 研究帶有 KRASG12C 突變之轉移性大腸癌在接受前線化學藥物治療失敗後(包含fluoropyrimidine, irinotecan, oxaliplatin)，使用 sotorasib + panitumumab 比上 trifluridine/tipiracil 或 regorafenib ，Primary endpoint 為PFS (研究設計如下)。結果顯示 sotorasib + panitumumab 比起 standard care 有較佳的 PFS (fig2-4)。   
 
(4) 錯誤，KRYSTAL-1 是一篇 phase 1-2 study，研究 Adagrasib 在 KRASG12C mutant tumor 的效果，其中包含 NSCLC, CRC and other solid tumors 三個 cohort。在大腸癌的研究中，Adagrasib + Cetuximab 比起 Adagrasib monotherapy 有較好的 ORR (46% v s 19%)、duration of response (7.6 months vs 4.3 months)、PFS (6.9 months vs 5.6 months)。(fig5:左為 Adagrasib + cetuximab；右為 adagrasib monotherapy)

question:
Which of the following statements about thromboembolism in cancer patients are (is) correct? 
(1)  Direct oral anticoagulants (DOACs), LMWH, and warfarin have all been used to treat 
     thromboembolism. Select regimen based on renal function, hepatic function, inpatient/ 
     outpatient status, approval, cost, patient preference, ease of administration, monitoring,  
     bleeding risk assessment, and ability to reverse anticoagulation.  
(2)  For acute DVT of proximal lower extremity, the first recommended treatment is IVC filter 
     instead of anticoagulant.  
(3)  For symptomatic catheter-associated DVT, consider anticoagulation treatment for at least 
     3 months or as long as the catheter is in place. 
(4)  For acute DVT of subclavian vein closed to the port-A, the first priority is remove the 
     port-A.
explanation:
(1)正確；Guideline: National Comprehensive Cancer Network 2020 其中的Recommendations "Choice of anticoagulation regimen should be based on individual risk of thrombosis and bleeding, renal and hepatic function, inpatient/outpatient status, FDA approval status, ease of administration, cost, burden of laboratory monitoring, agent reversibility, and patient preferences."，和此選項幾乎相同
(2)錯誤；根據Venous thromboembolism in cancer patients: ESMO Clinical Practice Guideline (2023)，起始治療仍是以anticoagulant 為主，再早一點的guideline會建議有anticoagulant contraindication時，才考慮filter 使用
(3)正確；Guideline: International Initiative on Thrombosis and Cancer 2019，針對CVC thrombosis treatment，提及"For the treatment of symptomatic CVC thrombosis, anticoagulation is recommended for a minimum of 3 months and as long as the CVC is in place"，和此選項幾乎相同 (補充：NCCN guideline DVT-3 將"and" 改成 "or")
(4)錯誤；根據NCCN guideline內文，"For patients with catheter-related DVT, in the absence of contraindication, anticoagulation is recommended. Anticoagulation without catheter removal is the preferred option for initial treatment, even for patients with asymptomatic DVT, provided that the catheter is necessary, functional, and free of infection."，使用anticoagulant讓管路不用被移除，是處置的優先目標，若有contraindication才考慮移除

故答案選B

Ref:
1. Streiff MB, Abutalib SA, Farge D, Murphy M, Connors JM, Piazza G. Update on Guidelines for the Management of Cancer-Associated Thrombosis. Oncologist. 2021 Jan;26(1):e24-e40. doi: 10.1002/onco.13596.
2. Falanga A, Ay C, Di Nisio M, Gerotziafas G, Jara-Palomares L, Langer F, Lecumberri R, Mandala M, Maraveyas A, Pabinger I, Sinn M, Syrigos K, Young A, Jordan K; ESMO Guidelines Committee. Electronic address: clinicalguidelines@esmo.org. Venous thromboembolism in cancer patients: ESMO Clinical Practice Guideline. Ann Oncol. 2023 May;34(5):452-467. doi: 10.1016/j.annonc.2022.12.014.
3. NCCN guideline v1.2025 Cancer associated venous thromboembolism disease DVT-3/MS-17

question:
一位30歲女性因右側乳癌接受切除手術，術後8個月右手臂逐漸腫起來，下列敘述中， 
正確的有? 
(1) 有接受液下淋巴結清除術者，比起接受哨兵淋巴結切除者，淋巴水腫機會高10倍。
(2) 越瘦的人，術後越可能有淋巴水腫。 
(3) 舉重物會增加淋巴水腫的程度與機會。 
(4) 衛教她淋巴水腫不會痊癒。
explanation:
Breast cancer-related lymphedema (BCRL)
(1)錯誤；根據文獻內提及，過往研究axillary lymph node dissection (ALND) 比起sentinel lymph node biopsy (SLNB)，發生BCRL的比率是19.9% (95% CI: 13.5–28.2)及 5.6%，比率約為4倍，非10倍
(2)錯誤；根據文獻內提及，過往研究發現與治療無關的BCRL risk factors 為obesity、subclinical edema及cellulitis，所以瘦的病人發生機會比較低
(3)錯誤；文獻內提到，"there is no limitation on the maximum amount of weight that can be lifted as long as weight-lifting exercises are supervised and progressive"，舉重物及其最大重量並沒有被限制，間接表示與BCRL無關。
(4)正確；National cancer institute 在lymphedema頁面，有提到"it is a chronic condition that cannot be cured but can be treated to relieve swelling and improve your ability to function day to day"；另根據Johns Hopkins Medicine 網站內"Breast cancer lymphedema after treatment"文章，提到"It’s a chronic (ongoing) condition that has no cure"


Ref: 
1.Gillespie TC, Sayegh HE, Brunelle CL, Daniell KM, Taghian AG. Breast cancer-related lymphedema: risk factors, precautionary measures, and treatments. Gland Surg. 2018 Aug;7(4):379-403. doi: 10.21037/gs.2017.11.04.
2.https://www.hopkinsmedicine.org/health/conditions-and-diseases/breast-cancer/breast-cancer-lymphedema-after-treatment
3.https://www.cancer.gov/about-cancer/treatment/side-effects/lymphedema

question:
除了手術治療、化學治療外，有些癌症可經由第一線放射線治療來治癒。下列癌症中， 
正確的有？ 
(1) 第一期喉癌 
(2) 第一期胃黏膜相關淋巴組織淋巴癌 
(3) 第一期鼻咽癌 
(4) 第一期胰臟癌
explanation:
1. 第一期喉癌，即為Glottic cancer stage I (T1N0M0)，根據NCCN guideline可第一線RT
2. 第一期胃黏膜相關淋巴組織淋巴癌，即為Extranodal marginal zone lymphoma of stomach stage I (T1-3N0M0), 根據NCCN guideline可第一線RT
3. 第一期鼻咽癌，即為Nasopharygeal carcinoma stage I (T1N0M0) ，根據NCCN guideline可第一線RT
4. 第一期胰臟癌，視為Pancreatic adenocarcinoma stage I (T1-2N0M0)， 根據NCCN guideline，Resectable 者去手術、non-resectable者Good PS 可做neoadjuvant management、non-resectable者Poor PS考慮BSC or palliative RT，非"可治癒放射治療"

故答案選(1)(2)(3) ->A

Ref: 
1. NCCN guideline v2.2025 Head and Neck cancer GLOT-2
2. NCCN guideline v2.2025 B-cell lymphomas EMZLG-2
3. NCCN guideline v2.2025 Head and Neck cancer NASO-2
4. NCCN guideline v2.2025 Pancreatic adenocarcinoma PANC-6

question:

給予方式是先實施骨盆治療後追加近距治療 (brachytherapy)，近距治療須評估下列 
那些(何者)危急器官(organ at risk)會被放射線治療而影響？ 
(1) 膀胱劑量

EMBRACE trial、ABS、CCO recommendation 皆列出等OAR "rectum、bladder、sigmoid" 的建議劑量

question:
關於癌症臨床試驗設計（design），下列敘述中，正確的有？ 
(1) Phase II trials如果隨機分派成實驗組治療vs.對照組治療，叫做randomized screening design。 
(2) Phase II trials如果隨機分派成實驗組治療1 vs.實驗組治療2，叫做randomized selection design。 
(3) Phase III trials如果selective biomarker陽性、陰性的病患都隨機分派成實驗組治療vs. 對照組治療，叫做biomarker stratified design。 
(4) Phase III trials如果只有selective biomarker陽性的病患隨機分派成實驗組治療vs.對照組治療，叫做biomarker enrichment design。
explanation:
(1)正確
(2)正確
(3)正確
(4)正確 (補充: Auxiliary-variable-enriched biomarker stratified design，利用較便宜的輔助biomarker來協助篩選病人，可以降低使用true biomarker來篩選病人的費用，與biomarker enrichment design相同之處為只納入biomarker陽性的病人進入trial)

question:
有關Non-small cell lung cancer的 rare mutations及其相對應的治療藥物，下列配對中，正確的有？ 
(1) RET fusion–positive NSCLC: Selpercatinib 
(2) NTRK fusion: Entrectinib  
(3) EGFR exon 20 insertion mutation: Amivantamab  
(4) BRAF V600E: Dactolisib
explanation:
(1)正確
(2)正確 (Entrectinib在NTRK 1/2/3 fusion NSCLC and ROS1 rearrangement NSCLC中都可以使用)
(3)正確
(4)錯誤，Dactolisib為inhibitor of mTOR complex 1/2 and pan-PI3K; BRAF V600E NSCLC可以使用的藥物為Dabrafenib/trametinib, Encorafenib/binimetinib and Vemurafenib

question:
有關Antibody-conjugate Drug (ADC) 藥物，下列敘述中，正確的有？ 
(1) Trastuzumab deruxtecan (T-DXd) 藉由 selectively cleavable by lysosomal histone proteases linker，帶著 anti-topoisomerase 1 inhibitor 的payload。 
(2) Sacituzumab govitecan是FDA approved於Trop-2過度表現之轉移復發TNBC。 
(3) Trastuzumab deruxtecan (T-DXd) 不只是作用於HER2+ metastatic breast cancer(MBC)，也證實於 low-HER2 expression MBC (HR+/HR-)一樣有不錯效果。 
(4) Enfortumab vedotin已經approved於治療無效復發轉移nectin-4表現colon adenocarcinoma。
explanation:
(1)正確，T-DXd的結構中含有cleavable tetrapeptide-based linker，被lysosomal enzymes (ex. cathepsins)分解後，釋放出payload anti-topoisomerase 1 inhibitor
(2)錯誤，與single agent chemotherapy (eribulin, vinorelbine, capecitabine, or gemcitabine)相比，SG可增加PFS and OS of relapsed or refractory metastatic triple-negative breast cancer (乳癌細胞的Trop-2表現量>90%)(ASCENT trial)，適用於所有的TNBC，不需要檢驗Trop-II表現量
(3)正確，在HER2-low metastatic breast cancer族群 (HER2-low: IHC 1+ or IHC 2+ with FISH negative)，與physician’s choice of chemotherapy相比，T-DXd可增加PFS and OS (DESTINY-Breast04 trial)
(4)錯誤，目前Enfortumab vedotin (EV)只有被核准使用於urothelial carcinoma (且不需要特別驗nectin-4表現量)，可以使用的情境有一線(EV with pembrolizumab，EV-302 trial)及後線(EV單用，EV-301 trial) ，EV在colon adenocarcinoma的角色目前還在臨床試驗當中

question:
有關Antibody-conjugate Drug (ADC) 藥物的敘述中，正確的有？ 
(1) ADC，例如TDM1，在接近target cell時，linker就會release payload，執行cytotoxicity及明顯bystander effect。 
(2) ADC有精準target 作用，故很少 myelotoxicity, nausea, or vomiting。 
(3) Trastuzmab deruxtecan 需要有 HER2 over-expression 才能執行target cell binding 及internalization。 
(4) Enfortumab vedotin 主要target是nectin-4。
explanation:
(1)錯誤，ADC與癌細胞表現的marker結合之後被吞噬進入癌細胞，linker part在癌細胞內被lysosomal enzyme分解，釋放出payload，達到毒殺細胞的效果 (並非在細胞附近釋放payload)
(2)錯誤，ADC仍然會有myelotoxicity, nausea and vomiting這些副作用 (比例上也不少)，以EV-301為例，any grade nausea (EV) 22.6% vs (chemothrapy) 21.6%; decreased appetite (EV) 30.7% vs (chemotherapy) 23.4%; leukopenia (EV) 5.4% vs (chemotherapy) 10.7%
(3)錯誤，Trastuzumab Deruxtecan 在HER2-low族群依舊有一定的效果 (DESTINY-Breast04 trial)
(4)正確

question:
有關Immune checkpoint inhibitor 治療的敘述中，正確的有？ 
(1) GI cancers with mismatch-repair deficiency, which has been hypothesized to result in increased numbers of tumor somatic mutations that would produce neoantigen targets, exhibit good response and tumor control to immune checkpoint blockade. 
(2) Clinical tumor response after immunotherapy should be assessed by conventional RECIST. 
(3) The major limitation to development of combinations has been the inability to identify the critical mechanisms of resistance to anti-CTLA-4 or to PD-1/ PD-L1 antagonists and as a result, accurate biomarkers to select patients for treatment with specific combination regimens are not yet available 
(4) The most common side effects observed (irAEs) were renal failure, cardiomyopathy and encephalitis, especially heart failure.
explanation:
(1) 描述正確。MMR deficiency是一種Tumor agnostics。MMR protein是參與DNA修復的蛋白質，MMR deficiency會導致DNA修復異常，因而容易在腫瘤細胞中產生各式突變，進而產生Neoantigens，讓免疫細胞更容易辨識到腫瘤。因此，腫瘤對於Immune checkpoint blockade的效果較好，像是在Colorectal cancer, cholangiocarcinoma等GI cancers中，臨床試驗均證實MMRd對於ICIs有不錯的效果
(2) 此選項錯誤。Conventional RECIST是用於評估傳統化療、target therapy的treatment response。由於ICIs的Response pattern不同於傳統化療、target therapy (舉例來說，ICIs的response包含Pseudoprogression, 產生Response所需時間可能較久、Response可以維持較久等)，因此評估ICIs response不能使用傳統RECIST，而是要用Immune-specific related response criteria，包含irRC, iRECIST, irRECIST, imRECIST 
(3) 描述正確。雖然目前驗Tumor PD-L1 expression, MMR deficiency/MSI-H, Tumor mutation burden (TMB)等指標能部分預測腫瘤對於ICIs的效果，但目前確實仍缺乏精確的Biomarkers來預測療效 
(4) 此選項錯誤。最常見的IrAEs是Dermatitis, 其他常見的包含Colitis, Hepatitis, Pneumonitis, Endocrinopathy (Thyroiditis, Hypophysitis)

question:
有關endocrine therapy治療藥物機轉與疾病的敘述中，正確的有？ 
(1) Unlike other CDK4/6 inhibitors, abemaciclib has significant single-agent activity in hormone-refractory and chemotherapy-refractory metastatic ER-positive metastatic breast cancer. 
(2) Abiraterone, one of anti-androgen agents, is commonly associated with gynecomastia and elevated transaminase levels requiring frequent monitoring. 
(3) Raloxifene is a SERM originally developed to treat osteoporosis. Large placebo-controlled  randomized trials demonstrated reduced rates of osteoporosis and a reduction in new breast cancers. 
(4) Octreotide and lanreotide are somatostatin analogs used to treat post-menopausal syndrome.
explanation:
(1) 描述正確。Abemaciclib monotherapy在MONARCH1 (phase 2 single-arm trial)和nextMONARCH(phase 2 RCT)均證實其對於HR+, HER2- MBC的療效
(2) 描述錯誤。Abiraterone是一種anti-androgen agents，機制是抑制Androgen synthesis。常見副作用確實包含AST/ALT上升，但不同於傳統Anti-androgen，Abiraterone並不常見gynecomastia。(Ref: Oncology. 2013;84(2):92-9. doi: 10.1159/000343821.)
(3) 描述正確。Raloxifene是SERM，用於治療Osteoporosis。根據MORE trial (multicenter, randomized, double-blind trial)，3年Ramoxifene相較於Placebo可以減少76%產生乳癌的風險 (Ref: JAMA. 1999 Jun 16;281(23):2189-97. doi: 10.1001/jama.281.23.2189.)
(4) 描述錯誤。Octreotide和lanreotide是somatostatin analogs沒錯，不過他們是用來治療Neuroendocrine tumor (NET), carcinoid syndrome, acromegaly等疾病，而非用於治療Post-menopausal syndrome。Post-menopausal syndrome的治療可以分為Hormone therapy (estrogens)和non-hormone therapy (ex. fezolinetant用於控制Vasomotor syndrome；Ospemifene, DHEA用於控制genitourinary syndrome of menopause)

question:
About cancer genetic alterations, which of the following statements are (is) correct? 
(1)  Prof. Vogelstein’s research has shown that tumors from patients with HNPCC requires the accumulation of many genetic events, a process takes decades from polyp to adenoma and finally invasive carcinoma.  
(2)  Circulating tumor DNA fragments contain the identical genetic defects as the tumor themselves; thus, the blood can reveal tumor point mutations, rearrangements, as well as amplifications. 
(3)  Major types of somatic mutations for oncogene present in malignant tumors include nucleotide substitutions, small insertions and deletions (indels), chromosomal rearrangements, and copy number alterations. 
(4)  The drug-resistant EGFR mutation is structurally analogous to the mutated gatekeeper residue T315I in BCR-ABL, T670I in c-Kit, and L1196M in EML4-ALK, which have been shown previously to confer resistance kinase inhibitors.
explanation:
(1) 描述錯誤。Prof. Vogelstein’s是研究"Spontaneous" CRC發展成Carcinoma的基因變化，而非HNPCC (Ref: N Engl J Med 1988;319:525-532. DOI: 10.1056/NEJM198809013190901)。HNPCC是遺傳性的大腸癌，致病機轉與MMR deficiency相關
(2) 描述錯誤。ctDNA不會包含所有Tumor的DNA fragments，因此ctDNA通常無法完全偵測Tumor genetic mutation。舉例來說，文獻指出使用ctDNA或Tissue檢測NSCLC EGFR variants，concordance rate約70%-90%，而非100% (Journal of Clinical Oncology. Volume 36, Number 16. https://doi.org/10.1200/JCO.2017.76.8671)
(3) 老實說，我不知道這個選項錯在哪
(4) 描述正確。
我覺得(3)(4)都是正確的選項，不過因為選項只有(4)，所以我選D

question:
The identification of drivers versus the passenger gene mutation from NGS is of utmost relevance and remains a pressing challenge in cancer genetics. Which of the following scenarios are (is) in favor of a driver mutation?
(1) mutations that frequently occur on different patients
(2) mutations may have characteristics like those causing Mendelian disease when inherited in the germ line
(3) mutations that affect locations that have previously been shown to be cancer causing in protein members of the same gene family
(4) mutations with nonsynonymous single nucleotide polymorphisms with high minor allele frequencies
explanation:
在腫瘤形成的過程中會累積多種突變，大部分的突變並不會賦予腫瘤細胞產生生長優勢，稱之為Passenger mutation；反之，少部份的突變會賦予腫瘤細胞產生生長優勢，因此稱為Driver mutation。
(1) 高比例病人有這個突變 → 該突變比較有可能是Driver mutation
(2) 該突變具有孟德爾基因遺傳模式 → 代表只要有這個突變就會發病 → 比較有可能是Driver mutation
(3) 突變發生的蛋白質，有已知與該蛋白同一家族的其他蛋白質突變會直接導致癌症 → 有可能是Driver mutation
(4) Non-synonymous single nucleotide polymorphisms (nsSNPs)是指會影響轉譯蛋白質amino acid sequence的SNP. Minor allel freqency (MAF)是指整個族群中第二常見的基因變異發生的比例 (舉例來說:某個SNP在族群中最常見的nucleotide是T(佔50%)，第二常見的是C(佔40%)，則該SNP的MAF就是40%)。因此，此選項描述的High minor allele frequencies的nsSNPs，只能說該nsSNPs第二常見的變異佔整個族群的比例是高的，並未提及與某疾病的關聯，因此不太可能是Driver mutation
